content: i usually use cotton yarn like sugar n cream but i ve also deborah norville s everyday yarn heartland yarn and patons sock yarn with a smaller hook and added beads this simple pattern is a great way to use up stash and wine bottle cozies make awesome gifts so the next time you have about 30-60 minutes in front of the tv or in the car pick up your hook and give it a try video tutorial and instructions are on my linked blog
